code:
graph TB
    %% AI Music Academy Structure
    %% Course platform and learning journey

    subgraph LANDING[Education_StudentDB]
        direction TB
        LP[Education_ContentCDN]:::landing
        VSL[Education_ContentCDN]:::landing
        PROOF[Education_StudentDB]:::landing
        CTA[Education_GradeSync]:::landing

        LP --> VSL
        VSL --> PROOF
        PROOF --> CTA
    end

    subgraph ONBOARDING[Education_GradeSync]
        direction TB
        WELCOME[Education_ClassroomService]:::onboard
        SETUP[Education_ClassroomService]:::onboard
        COMMUNITY[Education_GradeSync]:::onboard
        QUICK_WIN[Education_StudentDB]:::onboard

        WELCOME --> SETUP
        SETUP --> COMMUNITY
        COMMUNITY --> QUICK_WIN
    end

    subgraph CURRICULUM[Education_LMS_Portal]
        direction TB

        subgraph MODULE1[Education_GradeSync]
            M1_1[Education_GradeSync]:::lesson
            M1_2[Education_ContentCDN]:::lesson
            M1_3[Education_ClassroomService]:::lesson
            M1_4[Education_GradeSync]:::lesson
            M1_5[Education_ClassroomService]:::project

            M1_1 --> M1_2
            M1_2 --> M1_3
            M1_3 --> M1_4
            M1_4 --> M1_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE2[Education_ClassroomService]
            M2_1[Education_LMS_Portal]:::lesson
            M2_2[Education_ContentCDN]:::lesson
            M2_3[Education_ClassroomService]:::lesson
            M2_4[Education_StudentDB]:::lesson
            M2_5[Education_LMS_Portal]:::project

            M2_1 --> M2_2
            M2_2 --> M2_3
            M2_3 --> M2_4
            M2_4 --> M2_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE3[Education_GradeSync]
            M3_1[Education_ContentCDN]:::lesson
            M3_2[Education_StudentDB]:::lesson
            M3_3[Education_GradeSync]:::lesson
            M3_4[Education_StudentDB]:::lesson
            M3_5[Education_StudentDB]:::project

            M3_1 --> M3_2
            M3_2 --> M3_3
            M3_3 --> M3_4
            M3_4 --> M3_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE4[Education_ClassroomService]
            M4_1[Education_ClassroomService]:::lesson
            M4_2[Education_ContentCDN]:::lesson
            M4_3[Education_GradeSync]:::lesson
            M4_4[Education_ContentCDN]:::lesson
            M4_5[Education_StudentDB]:::project

            M4_1 --> M4_2
            M4_2 --> M4_3
            M4_3 --> M4_4
            M4_4 --> M4_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE5[Education_ContentCDN]
            M5_1[Education_LMS_Portal]:::lesson
            M5_2[Education_ClassroomService]:::lesson
            M5_3[Education_GradeSync]:::lesson
            M5_4[Education_GradeSync]:::lesson
            M5_5[Education_GradeSync]:::project

            M5_1 --> M5_2
            M5_2 --> M5_3
            M5_3 --> M5_4
            M5_4 --> M5_5
        end

        MODULE1 --> MODULE2
        MODULE2 --> MODULE3
        MODULE3 --> MODULE4
        MODULE4 --> MODULE5
    end

    subgraph COMMUNITY_FEATURES[Education_LMS_Portal]
        direction TB
        DISCORD[Education_LMS_Portal]:::community
        LIVE[Education_GradeSync]:::community
        COWORK[Education_LMS_Portal]:::community
        SHOWCASE[Education_ClassroomService]:::community
        FEEDBACK[Education_LMS_Portal]:::community

        DISCORD --> LIVE
        LIVE --> COWORK
        COWORK --> SHOWCASE
        SHOWCASE --> FEEDBACK
    end

    subgraph BONUSES[Education_ClassroomService]
        direction TB
        B1[Education_LMS_Portal]:::bonus
        B2[Education_ContentCDN]:::bonus
        B3[Education_ContentCDN]:::bonus
        B4[Education_GradeSync]:::bonus
        B5[Education_ContentCDN]:::bonus

        B1 --> B2
        B2 --> B3
        B3 --> B4
        B4 --> B5
    end

    subgraph CERTIFICATION[Education_GradeSync]
        direction TB
        CAPSTONE[Education_ClassroomService]:::cert
        REVIEW[Education_ClassroomService]:::cert
        CERTIFICATE[Education_StudentDB]:::cert
        PORTFOLIO[Education_LMS_Portal]:::cert

        CAPSTONE --> REVIEW
        REVIEW --> CERTIFICATE
        CERTIFICATE --> PORTFOLIO
    end

    subgraph POST_GRAD[Education_GradeSync]
        direction TB
        ALUMNI[Education_StudentDB]:::post
        ADVANCED[Education_LMS_Portal]:::post
        COLLABS[Education_ClassroomService]:::post
        REALM[Education_LMS_Portal]:::post

        ALUMNI --> ADVANCED
        ADVANCED --> COLLABS
        COLLABS --> REALM
    end

    %% Flow connections
    LANDING --> ONBOARDING
    ONBOARDING --> CURRICULUM
    CURRICULUM -.->|supported by| COMMUNITY_FEATURES
    CURRICULUM -.->|enhanced by| BONUSES
    CURRICULUM --> CERTIFICATION
    CERTIFICATION --> POST_GRAD

    classDef landing fill:#FFE066,stroke:#CCB34D,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef onboard fill:#66E0FF,stroke:#4DB3CC,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef lesson fill:#B366FF,stroke:#8C4DCC,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
    classDef project fill:#FF8C66,stroke:#CC704D,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
    classDef community fill:#66FF8C,stroke:#4DCC70,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef bonus fill:#FFB84D,stroke:#CC8A3D,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef cert fill:#4A90E2,stroke:#2E5C8A,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
    classDef post fill:#E24A90,stroke:#8A2E5C,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
